Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.platformer.escape_beyond.controller

Class StartController

java.lang.Object
com.platformer.escape_beyond.controller.StartController
public class StartController extends Object
Controller class for the Start screen. Handles interactions with the start screen's UI elements and transitions to the home screen.

    • switchOnClicked

      public void switchOnClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the Start button is clicked. Transitions the user to the home screen of the game.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by clicking the Start button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while switching screens.
